definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I wouldn't want my son to have a jailbait hanging around him.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想讓個禍水妞跟我兒子整天出來進去的。

sentences.english: She's a beautiful girl—but beware, she's jailbait.
sentences.chinese: 她是個漂亮姑娘，但是要當心，可是個禍水妞兒啊。

sentences.english: She’s a beautiful girl—but beware, she’s jailbait.
sentences.chinese: 她是個漂亮姑娘，但是要當心，可是個禍水妞兒啊。

sentences.english: All say beauty is, what the crime as a beauty?
sentences.chinese: 都說紅顏是禍水，紅顏何罪？

sentences.english: The underworld is a peril to the area.
sentences.chinese: 這個黑社會組織是當地的一股禍水。

sentences.english: The world doesn’t need another gag about a girl with come in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 這個世界大可不必擔心剃光頭的女孩是誘人的禍水啦。

sentences.english: She wouldn't want her son to have a jailbait hanging around him.
sentences.chinese: 她不想讓個禍水妞跟她的兒子整天出來進去的。

sentences.english: She is Helen of Troy in the quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 紅顏禍水，這場爭論因她而起。

definition: lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
(in former times) to bind one's hair on coming of age
to produce clouds with one turn of the hand and rain with another (idiom); fig. to shift one's ground/tricky and inconstant/to make love
a golden house to keep one's mistress (idiom); a magnificent house built for a beloved woman
heart/intention/one's inclination/state of mind/to have the heart for sth/mood
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
